- Hey, everyone, I hope

I'm with David, the Hungry Tourist,

Today is gonna be an
unbelievable Sri Lankan food day.

We've been invited by

who are from Weligama
in Southern Sri Lanka.

everything cooked traditional
over fire in clay pots.
